title: Fah Che Leong, MD
description: In his practice, Dr. Fah Che Leong performs pelvic reconstructive surgery and provides urodynamic testing and cystoscopy. He specializes in fecal and urinary incontinence. He also treats women with pelvic organ prolapse and pelvic floor dysfunction. Dr. Leong utilizes the latest developments and techniques in his practice, including peripheral sacral neuromodulation for urge incontinence. Research areas of interest include: treatment of interstitial cystitis; myofascial pain; treatment of overactive bladder; and peripheral sacral neuromodulation for urge incontinence, voiding dysfunction and pelvic pain. Dr. Leong is a professor in the Department of Obstetrics, Gynecology, and Women's Health, Division of Female Pelvic Medicine and Reconstructive Surgery, at Saint Louis University School of Medicine. He is a member of the American Urogynecologic Society. Dr. Leong enjoys riding motorcycles.
